title: Monk's Belt
summaries: The Monk's Belt is a Hardmode accessory that increases the maximum number of sentries by one and increases summon damage by 10%. It is dropped by the Ogre during the Old One's Army event with a 16.66% / 25% (T2) or 8.33% (T3) chance.

statistics.Tooltip:
Increase your max number of sentries by 1
Increases summon damage by 10%
statistics.Sell: 3 GC
